actions.name: Fist
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Chain Sweep
entries: The ogre swings its chain, and every creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Chain Smash {@recharge}
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure the target is {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The {@condition unconscious} target repeats the saving throw if it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
